select count(userid) as number,case sex when '1' then '女' else '男' end as sex from user_base
createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and StoreId=#{storeid} :: bigint
group by sex

select cmu.UserId from crd_membershipcard_purchase cmb left join Crd_MembershipCard_Base cm on cm.CardId=cmb.CardId left join Crd_MembershipCard_User cmu on cmu.cardno=cmb.cardno
and cm.isfree=true and cmb.buytype='F' and cmb.createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and cmb.createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and cmb.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint
group by cmu.userId

select userid from crd_membershipcard_purchase cmb left join Crd_MembershipCard_Base c on cmb.cardid = c.cardid left join Crd_MembershipCard_User cmu on cmu.cardno=cmb.cardno c.isfree=false and cmb.buytype='F'
and cmb.cardno in
#{cardno}
and cmb.createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and cmb.createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and cmb.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint
group by cmu.userid

select userid from crd_membershipcard_purchase cmb left join Crd_MembershipCardCategory_Base cmgb on cmgb.cardid=cmb.cardid and cmgb.cardnumber=12 left join Crd_MembershipCard_Base c on cmb.cardid = c.cardid left join Crd_MembershipCard_User cmu on cmu.cardno=cmb.cardno c.isfree=false and cmb.buytype='F'
and cmb.cardno in
#{cardno}
and cmb.createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and cmb.createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and cmb.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint
group by cmu.userid

select userid from crd_membershipcard_purchase cmb left join Crd_MembershipCard_Base cm on cm.CardId=cmb.CardId left join Crd_MembershipCard_Base c on cmb.cardid = c.cardid left join Crd_MembershipCard_User cmu on cmu.cardno=cmb.cardno c.isfree=false and cmb.buytype='F' and cm.cardnumber=12
and cmb.cardno in
#{cardno}
and cmb.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint
group by cmu.userid

select userid from ( select COALESCE(count(a.userid),0) as number,a.userid from Ord_OrderCourse a left join Crd_MembershipCard_Base cm on a.cardno=cm.cardno left join Crd_MembershipCardCategory_Base cmb on cmb.cardid =cm.cardid left join crd_membershipcard_purchase cmp on cmp.cardno=cm.cardno and cmp.BuyType='F' a.signstate=1 and cm.isfree=true and a.CourseDate>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and a.CourseDate<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and cmp.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint
group by a.userid ) as t1 where number>1

select count(cm.userid)as times,userid from Crd_MembershipCard_Purchase cmp left join Crd_MembershipCard_User cm on cm.cardno=cmp.cardno left join Crd_MembershipCard_Base cmb on cmp.cardno = cmb.cardno
cmp.BuyType='C' and cmp.createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and cmp.createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and cmp.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint
and cmb.isfree=false
group by userid having count(cm.userid)>2

select userid from Crd_MembershipCard_Base cmb left join Crd_MembershipCard_User cmu on cmu.cardno=cmb.cardno left join Crd_MembershipCard_Purchase cmp on cmp.cardno=cmb.cardno and cmp.buytype='F'
( CurTimes<=1 or PeriodValidity<=7 ) and cmb.createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and cmb.createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and cmp.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint
group by userid

select count(cmu.userid) from Crd_MembershipCard_Purchase cmp left join Crd_MembershipCard_User cmu on cmp.cardno=cmu.cardno
cmp.buytype='F' and cmp.createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and cmp.createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and cmp.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint
and cmu.userid in
#{userid} :: bigint
group by cmu.userid

select userid from user_base ub
ub.createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and ub.createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and ub.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint

select ub.userid from user_base ub
ub.sourcetype =#{sourcetype} and ub.createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and ub.createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and ub.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint
group by ub.userid

select count(userid) from (select ub.userid from user_base ub
ub.sourcetype =#{sourcetype} and ub.createdon>=to_timestamp(#{CourseDatestart},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') and ub.createdon<=to_timestamp(#{CourseDateend},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
and ub.storeid=#{storeid} :: bigint
group by ub.userid) as a
